alert.note: Alert for Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 2:06PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern San Patricio and southwestern Refugio Counties through 230 PM CST... At 205 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Paul, or 7 miles north of Sinton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Paul. This includes the following highways... US Highway 181 near mile marker 618. US Highway 77 between mile markers 630 and 642. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
